info.name: Scrollbars - Minimalistic
info.description: A minimalistic, less visible style for all scrollbars, for those who only use them to see how long the page is.
info.additionalInfo:
It should be noted that I don't use this myself anymore, but since it seems to work well – and with Firefox 4 – and it's still quite popular, I'll keep it up.

Version 1.0 (Jun 03 2011)
Restarted the project.
